attributes.action: Give maximum publicity to hosting the July EU expansion conference and benefits
attributes.background: HM Govt is hosting a summit on EU expansion this July, touting the “security, stability and prosperity” which come from EU Membership. The UK must make a success of this, giving the benefits of EU membership maximum government support and publicity.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "give maximum publicity". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
